title: The LORD Defeats Baal
description:
Readings from:
1 Kings 18:25-26, 29, 36-40
Today's passages were read by Rachel Nothnagel. She is the creator of Simple Bible on Instagram. She’s an online student at Midwestern Baptist Theological Seminary, majoring in Biblical Studies. Rachel is married to Jacob, and they live in southwest Missouri. 
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
